author: David Griffin
title: Hulu's Solar Opposites Trailer Looks Like a Rick and Morty Spinoff
description: Here's the bonkers new trailer for Hulu's Solar Opposites, a new adult animated comedy from Rick and Morty co-creator Justin Roiland.
content: While we're waiting for Rick and Morty to resume its long-awaited fourth season on Adult Swim, co-creator Justin Roiland has another surreal animated sci-fi tale to share - Hulu's Solar Opposites, which has just debuted its first official teaser trailer.The s… [+1645 chars]
